summary: A unit‑test module that validates the timeout handling logic used by Ansible fact‑gathering utilities. It defines helper functions to simulate delayed operations and various test cases that verify explicit and implicit timeout settings, exception propagation, and configuration of gather timeout thresholds.
business_intent: To guarantee that fact‑gathering processes respect configured timeout limits, raise appropriate errors on overruns, and behave predictably under different timeout configurations, thereby preventing hangs and ensuring reliable automation.
